'''3.12.20''' ('''3.12.30''') is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher]] that was released on April 1, 2025.

== Additions ==
* Added new Launchcraft popup when opening the launcher.
* Added Launchcraft bar on the bottom corner, inspired by [[Java Edition 25w14craftmine|Craftmine]].
** Added skill tree to uplevel the Launcher Experience.
** Added new "Select Skill" button.

=== Levels ===
The player can now acquire skills by hovering over the Launchcraft bar, which then the map cursor will be moved and eventually gets filled, along with a few experience orb animations. Everytime the bar gets filled, a level will be rewarded to the player.

=== Launcher Skills ===
After clicking on the "Select Skill" button, a new menu will appear with a level skill progression, along with options that the user can activate on the launcher. Some options are locked through specific levels that the player must acquire.
